results.title: Configure user authentication - Microsoft Copilot Studio
results.description: Configure authentication with your identity provider to enable users to sign in when having an agent conversation.

descriptions.content: Users can sign in with Microsoft Entra ID, or with any OAuth2 identity provider such as Google or Facebook.
If the service provider is Generic OAuth2, you can turn Require users to sign in on or off.
Grant type The OAuth2 grant type you want to use.
